required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect Of Intravenous Hyoscine -N-Butyl Bromide In Management Of Prolonged Labor In Nulliparous
clinical_study.official_title: Effect Of Intravenous Hyoscine -N-Butyl Bromide In Management Of Prolonged Labor In Nulliparous

brief_summary.textblock:
Women will be admitted when active phase of labour starts defined as the presence of at least three regular uterine contractions over 10 minutes with cervical dilatation four centimeters with cervical effacement not less than 50% and no progress of labor for 2 hours or more.
Group A will receive injection Hyoscine butyl bromide 20 mg first dose at the time of amniotomy, and second dose 2 hours after. Group B, will receive normal saline same volume first dose at the time of amniotomy, and second dose 2 hours after.
Labor will be monitored by Vaginal examination every two hours. The duration of the first stage was calculated from the time of cervical dilatation of three to four centimeters in active labor until a fully dilated cervix was observed.

detailed_description.textblock:
Women will be admitted when active phase of labour starts defined as the presence of at least three regular uterine contractions over 10 minutes with cervical dilatation four centimeters with cervical effacement not less than 50% and no progress of labor for 2 hours or more.
Group A will receive injection Hyoscine butyl bromide 20 mg first dose at the time of amniotomy, and second dose 2 hours after. Group B, will receive normal saline same volume first dose at the time of amniotomy, and second dose 2 hours after.
Labor will be monitored by Vaginal examination every two hours. The duration of the first stage was calculated from the time of cervical dilatation of three to four centimeters in active labor until a fully dilated cervix was observed.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Group A will receive injection Hyoscine butyl bromide 20 mg first dose at the time of amniotomy, and second dose 2 hours after. Group B, will receive normal saline same volume first dose at the time of amniotomy, and second dose 2 hours after
study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: the duration of active phase of first stage of labor
primary_outcome.description: time elapsed between start of active phase till full cervical dilatation

arm_group.description: 7. Group A will receive injection Hyoscine butyl bromide 20 mg first dose at the time of amniotomy, and second dose 2 hours after.
Group B, will receive normal saline same volume first dose at the time of amniotomy, and second dose 2 hours after

intervention.description: 7. Group A will receive injection Hyoscine butyl bromide 20 mg first dose at the time of amniotomy, and second dose after 2 hours
Group B, will receive normal saline same volume first dose at the time of amniotomy, and second dose after 2 hours

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- • Nulliparous women.
- cervical dilatation in the active phase of less than 1.2 cm/h for nulliparous women
- Gestational age ≥ 37 weeks.
- Singleton pregnancy.
- Vertex presentation.
- Cervical dilatation ≥ 4cm.
- Intact fetal membranes.
- No evidence of maternal or fetal distress.
- Average size baby.
Exclusion Criteria:
- History of cervical surgery.
- Mal-presentation and mal-positions.
- Hypersensitivity to Hyoscine.
- Contraindication for vaginal delivery.
